intro: A curious boy, cool puzzles, and a forest that needs you to restore harmony
description:
Ready for a true adventure?
Imagine you're traveling through time and space, where there's always something new and amazing waiting for you. There are colorful locations, hidden routes, devious villains, magical items, and exciting puzzles to solve at each level. Your wits and ingenuity will be your best allies in unravelling the mysteries of this magical world and reaching the end.

It's all about the hat
The hero's hat is more than just a pretty accessory. It's got some pretty amazing abilities hidden up its sleeve. You can use it to teleport, solve puzzles, activate mechanisms, and open new locations. As you progress in the game, you'll be able to perform more and more acrobatic tricks. Plus, the built-in store lets you customize your hero.

Love challenges? We've got something special for you.
If you find the standard tasks too easy, you'll definitely enjoy the additional puzzle levels. They'll help you hone your skills and discover new superpowers. This is where you'll set new personal records and show what you're capable of.

Music that set the rhythm
The main melodies and leitmotifs are culturally inspired, arranged in the hip-hop genre and adapted to the style of the game. The game's music is a blend of old-school beats, scratches, and the author's loops, which come together to create a unified concept, the perfect rhythm, and the ideal atmosphere. The sound is full of great musical experiments and discoveries.

Why is it worth a shot?
Rabbiman Adventures is an exciting journey where you can explore new things at every step. You can learn about different time travels, places, traditions, and cultures. The plot develops with you, and each step brings new interesting tasks. How far are you willing to go to uncover all the secrets?
